name: Armaldo
AbilityText: As long as Armaldo is your Active Pokemon, each player can't play any Supporter Cards.

name: Cacturne
AbilityText: If Cacturne is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Cacturne is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Cradily
AbilityText: As long as Cradily is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Pokemon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: Before using this effect, you may switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon, if any. The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Cradily (remove 1 if there is only 1).

name: Dusclops
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, the Defending Pokemon is Knocked Out.
Attack2Text: Put a total of 5 damage counters on all Defending Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Flareon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Flareon.

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy cards attached to Jolteon. If you do, this attack's base damage is 70 instead of 40.

name: Ludicolo
AbilityText: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Ludicolo.
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Ludicolo but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Lunatone
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Solrock is in play, you may use this power. Until the end of your turn, Lunatone's type is Darkness. This power can't be used if Lunatone is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokemon in play, draw 3 cards.

name: Mawile
Attack1Text: Look at your opponent's hand. You may have your opponent shuffle a Supporter card you find there into his or her deck. If you do, your opponent draws a card.
Attack2Text: Before doing damage, you may switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokemon.

name: Sableye
Attack1Text: Look at your opponent's hand. You may use the effect of a Supporter card you find there as the effect of this attack. (The Supporter card remains in your opponent's hand.)
Attack2Text: You may discard a Darkness Energy card attached to Sableye. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Seviper
Attack1Text: You may discard a Grass Energy card attached to Seviper. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep and Poisoned.

name: Shiftry
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, return 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Shiftry is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 80 damage minus 10 damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Solrock
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Lunatone is in play, you may use this power. Until the end of your turn, Solrock's type is Fire. This power can't be used if Solrock is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokemon in play, draw 3 cards.

name: Zangoose
AbilityText: Zangoose can't be Poisoned.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Seviper, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Arcanine
AbilityText: If Arcanine is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Arcanine is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Fire Energy cards attached to Arcanine.

name: Espeon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Does 20 more damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Golduck
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Golduck is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon (choose 1 if there are 2) is now Confused. This power can't be used if Golduck is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 30 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Kecleon
AbilityText: Kecleon's type is the same as every type of basic Energy card attached to Kecleon.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Omastar
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokemon in play, remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of them and put those cards back into his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omastar but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 40 damage in this way.

name: Pichu
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokemon. Put 1 damage counter on that Pokemon for each Energy card attached in this way.

name: Sandslash
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon. The Defending Pokemon can't retreat until the end of your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness or Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Shiftry
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Steelix
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Steelix.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Umbreon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Vaporeon
Attack2Text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

name: Wobbuffet
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Wobbuffet by your opponent's Pokemon-ex.
Attack1Text: Wobbuffet does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Anorith
Attack1Text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Anorith
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

name: Arbok
AbilityText: As long as Arbok is your Active Pokemon, any damage done to your Pokemon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 10 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.

name: Azumarill
Attack1Text: If you have Water Energy cards in your hand, attach as many Water Energy cards as you like to any of your Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to all of your Active Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Azurill
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Marill from your hand onto Azurill (this counts as evolving Azurill), and remove all damage counters from Azurill.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Baltoy
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. You switch Baltoy with 1 of your Benched Pokemon, if any.

name: Breloom
Attack1Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

name: Delcatty
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of basic Energy cards attached to all of the Active Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's).

name: Electabuzz
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Electabuzz.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Elekid
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Electabuzz from your hand onto Elekid (this counts as evolving Elekid) and remove all damage counters from Elekid.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Fearow
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to each Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Illumise
AbilityText: As long as Volbeat is in play, any damage done to Illumise by attacks from Fighting Pokemon and Darkness Pokemon is reduced by 30. You can't reduce more than 30 damage even if there is more than 1 Volbeat in play.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Kabuto
AbilityText: Any damage done to Kabuto by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Omanyte, Kabuto, or any Basic Pokemon and put as many of them as you like onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. Treat the new Benched Pokemon as Basic Pokemon.

name: Kirlia
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If Kirlia and the Defending Pokemon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 30 instead of 60.

name: Lairon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Lairon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Lileep
Attack1Text: Search your deck for Omanyte, Kabuto, Aerodactyl, Lileep, or Anorith and put up to 2 of them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. Treat the new Benched Pokemon as Basic Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokemon in play, choose 1 of them and flip a coin. If heads, remove the highest Stage Evolution card on that Pokemon and have your opponent shuffle it into his or her deck.

name: Lileep
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Linoone
Attack1Text: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lombre
AbilityText: At any time between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Lombre.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Lombre
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damages times the number of heads.

name: Murkrow
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Pelipper
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Pelipper but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

name: Quilava
Attack2Text: You may discard a Fire Energy card attached to Quilava. If you do, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Vigoroth
Attack1Text: During your next turn, base damage of Vigoroth's Slash is attack is 90 instead of 40.

name: Volbeat
AbilityText: As long as Illumise is in play, Volbeat's Retreat Cost is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Wynaut

Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon card or Evolution card for each Energy attached to Wynaut, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
